attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to bring back the death penalty for murder,whether it is policemen,children,o.a.p's or anyone else.It is about time we stopped pusst footing around these murderers and gave them a taste of their own medicine.At the moment they have nothing to fear so they can murder as many people as they like and all they get is locked up in a cell with 3 meals a day tv,and anything they want to keep them quiet.And after a few years some do gooder says "they are cured now and can go back into society" and out they come and do it again.
